alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George`s Lake, or 11 miles east of Keystone Heights, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs and George`s Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
